description: Extracorporeal membranous oxygenation. Incorporates a pump and oxygenator
Intra-aortic balloon pump. Mechanically augments cardiac output by inflating a balloon.
Percutaneous left ventricular assist device. Common and nonsurgical, so given its own category
Other temporary left ventricular assist devices other than Impella. No oxygenator.
Right ventricular assit device including Impella RP. No oxygenator (excludes OxyRVAD)
Left ventricular assist device surgically implanted such that patient can discharge with it.
